episodes.title: 'Uncle Jeffrey': Emails reveal ties between Epstein and Kathy Ruemmler
episodes.description:
Kathy Ruemmler, the top lawyer at Goldman Sachs and former White House counsel to President Barack Obama, announced her resignation Thursday after emails between her and Jeffrey Epstein showed a close relationship where she described him as an “older brother.”

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Jamie Raskin accuses DOJ of 'spying' on lawmakers reviewing Epstein files
episodes.description:
A top Democrat is calling for a watchdog investigation after photographs emerged suggesting that the Justice Department has been tracking the search history of lawmakers who are reviewing files from the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: LIVE: Pam Bondi testifies on Epstein files at oversight hearing (full)
episodes.description:
Watch live as a hearing titled “Oversight of the U.S. Department of Justice” takes place, with U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi as the main witness. 

Credit: House Judiciary Committee
#pambondi

episodes.title: Ted Lieu asks Pam Bondi about a video of Trump and Epstein at a party together
episodes.description:
Bondi responded to an old video of Trump and Epstein at a party together by saying it was “ridiculous” for Democratic Rep. Ted Lieu to ask her whether she would investigate Trump’s connections to Epstein.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Pam Bondi clashes with Democrats on Epstein files during DOJ hearing
episodes.description:
Epstein files hearing gets heated as Democratic members of Congress push Attorney General Pam Bondi for answers. "I am not going to get in the gutter with these people," Bondi shouts during the hearing.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: LIVE: Democrats and Epstein survivors speak ahead of Pam Bondi hearing
episodes.description:
Watch live as members of the Democratic Women’s Caucus, House Judiciary Committee Democrats, House Oversight Committee Democrats, and Epstein survivors hold a news conference ahead of Attorney General Pam Bondi’s appearance before the House Judiciary Committee. 

#live

episodes.title: Leavitt on potential pardon for Ghislaine Maxwell: 'Not a priority'
episodes.description:
White House press secretary Leavitt won’t confirm reported 2006 Trump call on Epstein, doesn't rule out a Ghislaine Maxwell pardon and backs Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick despite ties to the disgraced financier.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Ghislaine Maxwell declines to answer questions in testimony, seeks clemency
episodes.description:
Ghislaine Maxwell, the former girlfriend of Jeffrey Epstein, declined to answer questions from House lawmakers on Monday in a deposition. (Produced by Elaine Carroll)

#ghislainemaxwell #epsteinfiles #news 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Legal expert reacts to Ghislaine Maxwell declining to answer House questions
episodes.description:
Ghislaine Maxwell, the former girlfriend of Jeffrey Epstein, declined to answer questions from House lawmakers in a deposition Monday. Former federal prosecutor Neama Rahmani is reacting to Maxwell’s assertion of her Fifth Amendment rights. 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Ghislaine Maxwell is appealing to Trump for clemency, Democrats say
episodes.description:
House Democrats say Ghislaine Maxwell, the former girlfriend and confidante of Jeffrey Epstein, is appealing to President Donald Trump for clemency. This comes after  lawmakers tried Monday to interview Maxwell, but she invoked her Fifth Amendment rights.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Keir Starmer's job is under threat for appointing Peter Mandelson despite Epstein ties
episodes.description:
Friendship with Epstein has already brought down a British royal – Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, formerly known as Prince Andrew – and U.K ambassador to Washington Peter Mandelson, fired by Starmer over his links to the financier. Now new revelations have plunged Starmer’s center-left government into turmoil.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Keir Starmer says Peter Mandelson's vetting mentioned his Epstein ties
episodes.description:
Prime Minister Keir Starmer faced the wrath of opposition lawmakers, and his own Labour Party backbenchers, after acknowledging that he had known at the time of the 2024 appointment about former U.K. Ambassador to the U.S. Peter Mandelson's friendship with the convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

#keirstarmer #epsteinfiles #news 


Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Ex-Prince Andrew moves to King Charles III’s estate after latest Epstein files
episodes.description:
The former Prince Andrew has moved out of his longtime home on crown-owned land near Windsor Castle earlier than expected, after the latest release of documents from the U.S. investigation of Jeffrey Epstein revived questions about his friendship with the convicted sex offender. (AP Production: Marissa Duhaney)

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Trump lashes out at a reporter from CNN over questions on Epstein
episodes.description:
President Donald Trump lashed out at a reporter from CNN Tuesday over her questions about the Epstein files, telling her he's never seen her smile and demanding the country "get onto something else."

#trump 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Justice Department is releasing 3 million pages from its Jeffrey Epstein files
episodes.description:
The Justice Department says it's releasing more than 3 million pages of documents in the latest Jeffrey Epstein disclosure. #epstein #epsteinfiles 

Read live updates: https://bit.ly/4qP9xtX

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: House panel acts to hold Clintons in contempt of Congress over Epstein
episodes.description:
A House committee advanced resolutions Wednesday to hold former President Bill Clinton and former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton in contempt of Congress over the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

Read more: https://bit.ly/3NVDRo1 

#politics #news #usa 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Art installation of Trump's alleged birthday card to Epstein returns to DC
episodes.description:
An enlarged version of the purported birthday letter Donald Trump wrote to Jeffrey Epstein was resurrected on the National Mall on Tuesday by a protest group.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Bill and Hillary Clinton refuse to testify to Congress about Epstein
episodes.description:
Former President Bill Clinton and former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton are refusing to testify to Congress about Jeffrey Epstein. The Clintons, in a letter Tuesday, said they will not comply with a House subpoena to testify. (AP Production: Marissa Duhaney).

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: House members are pushing the DOJ to release more Epstein files
episodes.description:
U.S. lawmakers are pushing the Department of Justice to release more documents related to Jeffrey Epstein as some House Committees subpoena associates of the late convicted sex offender. (AP Video: Nathan Ellgren).

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Attorney for Epstein victim says FBI documents reveal reports of child pornography back in 1996
episodes.description:
Maria Farmer was an artist working for Jeffrey Epstein in New York City and has long said that she went to the FBI in 1996 to ask them to investigate the wealthy financier for having child pornography. But her attorney Jennifer Freeman told The Associated Press that FBI has never acknowledged or confirmed her account, until now.

(AP video by Kristin Hall)

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Turning Point USA attendees react to DOJ releasing Epstein files
episodes.description:
The Department of Justice on Friday released some of the records related to its investigations on Jeffrey Epstein. Some attendees at Turning Point AmericaFest 2025 shared their reactions.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: AP reporters review Epstein files after DOJ releases call logs, photos
episodes.description:
The Justice Department has started releasing its files on Jeffrey Epstein, a convicted sex offender known for his connections to powerful figures, including Donald Trump.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Federal judge grants request to unseal Ghislaine Maxwell case records
episodes.description:
A federal judge in New York has granted the Justice Department’s request to publicly release grand jury transcripts and other material from the sex trafficking case involving Jeffrey Epstein's former girlfriend and confidant. (AP video: Joseph B. Frederick).

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: Colombia expels members of ultra-Orthodox Jewish Lev Tahor sect to US
episodes.description:
Colombian migration authorities on Monday reported the expulsion of several members of the ultra-Orthodox Jewish Lev Tahor sect to the United States, including 17 foreign minors whom they considered at risk of having their rights violated.

#levtahor #jewish #colombia 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: LIVE: Rep. Adelita Grijalva speaks on Epstein files act
episodes.description: Watch live as U.S. Representative Adelita Grijalva, other Members of Congress, Epstein survivors, and national advocacy organizations speak on the Epstein Files Transparency Act.

episodes.title: UK residents react to King Charles III stripping Prince Andrew of titles
episodes.description:
British politicians, the public and the family of Virginia Roberts Giuffre on Friday praised King Charles III’s decision to strip his brother Andrew of his princely title and spacious home, a banishment that has left the disgraced royal increasingly exposed to political and legal scrutiny over his finances and his friendship with Jeffrey Epstein.

#kingcharles #princeandrew #kingcharlesiii 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

episodes.title: ‘Nobody Saved Us’: Man Describes Youth in ‘Cult’
episodes.description:
Jamey Anderson says his time in Word of Faith Fellowship was a hell of physical and emotional abuse. Now, he’s determined to speak out about the North Carolina-based church so no more kids go through what he says he suffered. (Dec. 13)

episodes.title: Ex-Members: Church Uses Pull, Lies to Keep Kids
episodes.description:
An Associated Press investigation has found that a secretive evangelical church has used lies and intimidation to bring in and keep children. Ex-members of Word of Faith Fellowship say the kids are exposed to sometimes violent church practices. (Nov. 13)

episodes.title: AP Exclusive: Abuse, Terror Haunt Ex Churchgoers
episodes.description:
From all over the world, they flocked to Spindale, North Carolina, lured by promises of inner peace and eternal life. What many found instead: years of terror — waged in the name of the Lord. The Word of Faith Fellowship denies the allegations. (Feb. 27)
